# Directadvert

## Example

```html
<amp-ad width="300" height="250" type="directadvert" data-block-id="1953045">
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For more information, please [see the Directadvert FAQ](https://www.directadvert.ru/text/help).

### Required parameters

-   `data-block-id`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-server-name`
